content:
FabricTransportServiceRemotingListener FabricTransportServiceRemotingListener Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Remoting.FabricTransport.Runtime
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.dll

An IServiceRemotingListener that uses fabric TCP transport to provide interface remoting for stateless and stateful services.

Edit

In this Article

public class FabricTransportServiceRemotingListener : IServiceRemotingListener, ICommunicationListenerPublic Class FabricTransportServiceRemotingListener
    Implements IServiceRemotingListener, ICommunicationListener

Explicit Interface Implementations

ICommunicationListener.Abort() Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.Runtime.ICommunicationListener.Abort()

Edit

This method causes the communication listener to close. Close is a terminal state and this method causes the transition to close ungracefully. Any outstanding operations (including close) should be canceled when this method is called.

void ICommunicationListener.Abort()Sub Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.Runtime.ICommunicationListener.Abort Implements ICommunicationListener.Abort

ICommunicationListener.CloseAsync(CancellationToken) Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.Runtime.ICommunicationListener.CloseAsync(CancellationToken)

Edit

This method causes the communication listener to close. Close is a terminal state and this method allows the communication listener to transition to this state in a graceful manner.

Task ICommunicationListener.CloseAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken)Function Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.Runtime.ICommunicationListener.CloseAsync(cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task Implements ICommunicationListener.CloseAsync
Parameters
cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token

Returns
Task Task

A Task that represents outstanding operation.

ICommunicationListener.OpenAsync(CancellationToken) Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.Runtime.ICommunicationListener.OpenAsync(CancellationToken)

Edit

This method causes the communication listener to be opened. Once the Open completes, the communication listener becomes usable - accepts and sends messages.

Task<string> ICommunicationListener.OpenAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken)Function Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.Runtime.ICommunicationListener.OpenAsync(cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task(Of String) Implements ICommunicationListener.OpenAsync
Parameters
cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

Cancellation token

Returns
Task<String> Task(Of String)

A Task that represents outstanding operation. The result of the Task is the endpoint string.
